snippet.title: Sora Steam Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
First gameplay preview for fast-paced shoot'em'up Sora, developed by OrangeJuice and localised for English-speaking audiences by Fruitbat Factory.
Coming on Steam January 5th!
http://store.steampowered.com/app/390730

Visit us at:
http://fruitbatfactory.com
